§ 5027a. Acceptance of donations(a) In generalExcept as provided in subsection (b), an entity receiving assistance under this subchapter may accept donations, including donations in cash or in kind fairly evaluated, including plant, equipment, or services.
(b) ExceptionAn entity receiving assistance under this subchapter to carry out an activity shall not accept donations from the beneficiaries of the activity.
(Pub. L. 93–113, title II, § 228, as added Pub. L. 111–13, title II, § 2146(e), Apr. 21, 2009, 123 Stat. 1591.)
